Changelog
=========

1.6.3 - 2011-09-28
------------------

- Zoomable Image works better
  [andreas_stocker]
- Improved Plone 3 compatibility
  [andreas_stocker]

1.6.2 - 2011-07-11
------------------

- Slide show fixes for Plone 3
  [andreas_stocker]

1.6.1 - 2011-05-02
------------------

- Private galleries can be selected in the gallery portlet
  [andreas_stocker]

1.6.0 - 2011-04-27
------------------

- Added slide show
  [andreas_stocker]

1.5.1 - 2011-02-08
------------------

- Now adding Image Gallery to default_page_types at install
  [andreas_stocker]

1.5 - 2010-11-29
----------------

- Improved translations
- Added multiple image upload (many thanks to *Plone Quick Upload* and *collective.uploadify* Projects)
  [andreas_stocker]

1.0.1 - 2010-09-02
------------------

- Fixes in installer
  [andreas_stocker]

1.0 - 2010-09-02
----------------

- Initial version of xhostplus.gallery
  [andreas_stocker]
